weekly_top_story.headline: Trump imposes escalating tariffs on eight NATO allies over Greenland refusal
weekly_top_story.summary: US President Trump threatened 10% tariffs (rising to 25% in June) on Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, and UK unless they sell Greenland, sparking joint protests, EU countermeasures, and fears of a transatlantic trade war that could destabilize NATO alliances and global commerce.

stories.headline: US withdrawal from WHO ‘risks global safety’, agency says in detailed rebuttal
stories.summary: The World Health Organization issued a strong rebuttal to the US decision to withdraw, warning it endangers global health security and pandemic preparedness amid ongoing international crises.

stories.headline: The World’s Ongoing Conflicts Underline Nuclear and Non-Nuclear States
stories.summary: Ongoing wars like Russia-Ukraine and Israel-Palestine highlight risks of nuclear-armed states clashing with non-nuclear ones, raising alarms over potential escalations involving China-Taiwan, North Korea-South Korea, or US-Iran.
